IT-1000 Final Project

After club car wash bought out my former car wash, I decided to join their team. At this position I was the Sales Consultant and my base pay was $15 an hour plus 50 cent commision per membership I sold. I went from taking $1800 home a month to $3,000. I was out selling memberships in all of Missouri, but I only won monthly competitions because I clocked the most hours. No one needs to know that though. During my time their I made many amazing friends and I really enjoyed the managers I got. I was able to meet Travis Kelce since he his part owner of the company. The first day I met him, in our converstaion I asked him what he did for a living. Needless to say, I only cared about Patrick Mahomes during that time. Eventualy, their was some aligations about the manager that wasn't very moral so I decided to leave because I knew it was true. Looking back, I regret working there for many different reasons but it did give me sales and experience that I a thankful for. Below is a table of the memberships that I would sell at Club Car Wash. | *Package* | *Price* | | `Rookie` | $20 | | `VIP` | $27 | | `Elite` | $32 | | `MVP` | $40 |
